pr_title: fix: Reject duplicate events from current payload

timeline.message: fix: Reject duplicate events from current payload

timeline.bodyText: We already have a validation rule that checks this condition: ProgramCheck
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

replies.bodyText: check for program is now left for ProgramCheck
replies.author: abyot

timeline.bodyText: We already have a validation rule that checks this condition: ProgramStageCheck
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

replies.bodyText: hmmm... so what this check already plugged in? or does program stage check precede program check? I added it because of a test failure
replies.author: abyot

timeline.bodyText: The refactoring of the Event import flow is designed around the concept of pipelines (preprocess, validation, postprocess). Any validation logic should be moved into a validation class (for instance in this case, a rule class named NonRepeatableProgramCheck)
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

replies.bodyText: Ok, this is a good point. Will create this new class. But EventManager is checking existing or not events ?
replies.author: abyot

replies.bodyText: EventManager does not execute any validation, it delegates to the validation framework.
replies.author: luciano-fiandesio

timeline.bodyText: We already have a validation rule that checks this condition: ProgramInstanceRepeatableStageCheck. We don't check for "duplicated events" but it should be possible to add it easily?
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

replies.bodyText:
We can do it here probably much better than ProgramStageCheck
Does WorkContext contain the entire event list from the payload?
replies.author: abyot

replies.bodyText: No, each validation check checks only one event at the time. The events are not stored in the WorkContext
replies.author: luciano-fiandesio

timeline.message: chore: Move validation tasks to the hooks
